choose.when: select bnum,btitle,writer bwriter,bdate,bhit from (select tn.bnum,tn.btitle,tn.writer,tn.bdate,tn.bhit,rownum r_num from (select b.bnum, b.btitle, m.memname writer, to_char(b.bdate,'yy-MM-DD') bdate, b.bhit from board b, member m where b.bmem = m.memnum and b.bgnum=#{bgnum} and b.bdeptno=#{bdeptno} order by b.bnum desc) tn) where r_num between #{begin} and #{end}
choose.otherwise: select bnum,btitle,writer bwriter,bdate,bhit from (select tn.bnum,tn.btitle,tn.writer,tn.bdate,tn.bhit,rownum r_num from (select b.bnum, b.btitle, m.memname writer, to_char(b.bdate,'yy-MM-DD') bdate, b.bhit from board b, member m where b.bmem = m.memnum and b.bgnum=0 order by b.bnum desc) tn) where r_num between #{begin} and #{end}

mapper.select: select count(*) cnt from board where bgnum=#{bgnum}
select count(*) cnt from comm where coboard=#{coboard}
select b.bhit,b.bmem,b.bnum,m.memname bwriter, b.btitle, b.bcont, TO_CHAR(b.bdate,'yyyy.MM.dd HH24:mi') bdate from board b, member m where b.bmem=m.memnum and bnum=#{bnum}
mapper.update: update board set bhit=(bhit+1) where bnum=#{bnum}
mapper.select: select c.cocont, TO_CHAR(c.codate,'yyyy.MM.dd HH24:mi') codate, m.memname coname,m.memprofile coimg,c.coboard from comm c, member m where c.comem = m.memnum and coboard=#{coboard} order by conum desc
select bname,bdeptno,bgnum from bname where bdeptno=#{bdeptno} order by bgnum asc
